roleset.name: join together, joining into a unified whole

role.descr: second thing unified, if separate from arg1

example.name: simple transitive
example.text: Arguing that the separate financial marketplaces acted as one , and concluding that the crash had `` raised the possibility of a full - scale financial system breakdown , '' the presidential task force called for establishing a super - regulator to oversee the markets , to make margins consistent across markets , to unify clearing systems and to install circuit breakers .

example.name: ARG2
example.text: It effectively attempted to unified church with state .

example.name: unk
example.text: Therefore , as long as the CCP regime has no intention to use military force against Taiwan , I pledge that during my term in office , I will not declare independence , I will not change the national title , I will not push forth the inclusion of the so-called " state - to - state " description in the Constitution , and I will not promote a referendum to change the status quo in regard to the question of independence or unification .

example.name: adjectival
example.text: That 's why `` we have been working hard to develop a single , more unified presence in Europe , '' said A.J.C. Smith , Marsh & McLennan 's president , at a London news conference yesterday .

example.name: just arg3 and LOC
example.text: the chances for economic unification in the area and economic recovery in Serbia are slim at best .

example.name: args 1 and 3
example.text: Yugoslavs Again Push for Economic Unification of Albania and Yugoslavia .

example.name: with args 1 and 4
example.text: ... to encourage the island 's formal unification into the People 's Republic

example.name: with args 1 and 4
example.text: The unification of PropBank 's frame files into semantically - based files took far longer than anyone expected !

roleset.note: UNIFY-V NOTES: Verbnet entry amalgamate-22.2-2-1. Framenet entry Amalgamate. (from unify.01-v)
UNIFICATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on unify-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls amalgamate-22.2-2-1. (from unification.01-n)
arg3-domain of unification added based on corpus examples, as it may occur in addition to args 1 & 2. (from unification.01-n)
